dct_title_s: A new and accurate map of the province of New York and part of the Jerseys, New England and Canada shewing the scenes of our military operations during the present war : also the new erected state of Vermont
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Published as the act directs Octr. 31st, 1780."
